- src/backtest/incremental/detectors/derived_zone.py: derived zone detector
- src/backtest/feature_registry.py: feature registry
- docs/specs/: architecture specs \(moved from docs/architecture/\)

Bash(git -C "C:/code/ai/trade" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(P2-05\): allow backtest signals with size_usdt=0 through risk check

Root cause: Backtest signals are created with size_usdt=0 because the
engine computes sizing later. RiskManager Check 6 \(min_viable_size=5\)
rejected these signals since 0 < 5.

Fix: Skip min_viable_size check when signal.size_usdt == 0, as this
indicates the backtest engine will compute the actual size after the
risk policy check.
